    Set in Kimberley and with St. Mary Lake reachable within 23 km, Western Lodge offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a garden. 2.7 km from Kimberley and 4.9 km from Marysville, the inn features ski storage space. The inn has family rooms.

    At the inn the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

    A continental breakfast is available every morning at Western Lodge.

    Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Kimberley, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

    Western Lodge provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

    Cranbrook/Canadian Rockies International is 20 km from the inn, while Cranbrook is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Canadian Rockies International Airport, 20 km from Western Lodge.

    Western Lodge has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 24 Oct 2018.

    How does it work?

    • 1

      It starts with a booking

      It starts with a booking

      The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.

    • 2

      Followed by a trip

      Followed by a trip

      When guests stay at the property they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff are and more.

    • 3

      And finally, a review

      And finally, a review

      After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.
